thread.title: The best airlines for long-haul economy
thread.title_full: The best airlines for long-haul economy

author: Megan Ellis
title: The best airlines for long-haul economy
text:
The best airlines for long-haul economy Article By: Megan Ellis Thu, 15 Oct 2015 5:28 PM Share Credit: pixabay.com/ Marianabiologa 
Ratings and safety website AirlineRatings.com has announced the best airlines for long-haul economy class. 
The list of airlines was determined by experienced editors of the website, who have travelled all around the world. The editors consulted each other and agreed upon a top ten list. 
In their top ten list for long-haul economy, Asian airlines featured prominently. Meanwhile, some Middle Eastern and Australasian airlines also made an appearance. 
See the top ten long haul economy class cabins, in alphabetical order, below: Air New Zealand
